thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: A New Phase Opens on North Korea; Is the U.S. Ready?

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: A New Phase Opens on North Korea; Is the U.S. Ready?
text:
A tricky new phase in the world’s most dangerous problem, the standoff over North Korea’s nuclear program, has just opened. The U.S. had better be ready.
But is it?

That question arises now that South Korean President Moon Jae-in has dispatched a high-level delegation to North Korea to open a new diplomatic path, and North Korean leader Kim... RELATED VIDEO Will Korean Olympics Solidarity Unsettle U.S.? Not only will North Korea send athletes to the Winter Olympics in South Korea, but the two countries' athletes will march under the same flag as well. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib explains how the cooperation affects U.S. policy towards Pyongyang and its nuclear threat. Photo: Getty (Originally published Jan. 17, 2018)
